text: In the Zone is the fourth studio album by Britney Spears, released on November 13, 2003. She wrote or co-wrote some songs of the album: "Me Against the Music", "Showdown", "Early Mornin", "Touch of My Hand", "The Hook Up", "Shadow", "Brave New Girl" and "Everytime". ==Track listing== ; Latin American Bonus Track ; Australian, European & Japanese bonus tracks ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:Britney Spears albums
title: In the Zone
